name: Minute Miner
description:
An asteroid orbits a pulsar in a far corner of the galaxy. On its surface, an incredible wealth of quantum gemeralds. An intrepid AI rover stands ready, waiting for the all clear. Once those doors open, there'll be no room for mistakes. 60 seconds. That's all that stands before this intelligent machine and total destruction, unless it can make it back to the safety of the silo in time. A haul of riches awaits, but 1 second too long on the asteroids surface and ZAP - nothing will be left, not even dust. You feel a trickle of oil down your chassis, knowing now, in what could be your last minute in operation, that indeed, a machine can feel fear.

Made as part of the 1 Minute Jam over 5 days

Credits;  

Joe McPhee: Game Designer, 3D Artist

Ed Hicks: Game Designer, Developer

Joe Beacham: 3D Artist, Effects Artist

With help from;

Turlough McHugh: Music & SFX
